Surprise

> The American commander of coalition forces in Afghanistan says he expects to bring Osama Bin Laden to justice by the end of this year. How much do you want to bet that Bin Laden is caught, oh, about ten days before the elections? Remember the October Surprise? (And also here.)

Lunch

When I was studying Chinese the school had a policy that we had to speak Chinese all the time, even during our lunch breaks. A well intentioned rule, but simply not one we were able to follow.
